column4: hi there, i have a machine that's quite new and i'm having problems to boot from ubuntu CD... could anyone help me?
Have you made it bootable, and is the bios set to boot from cd-rom?
yes, the CD is fine... i have ubuntu 6.06 for both 32 and 64 bits original cds... i also downloaded the ISOs of Edgy Eft (both 64 and 32 bits) and I had problems with all 4
actually, the CD is booting, the problems is that it doesn't load ubuntu live
